name: Krusty's Super Fun House
description:
Krusty's Super Fun House is an arcade game developed by Fox Williams and Audiogenic Software. It was originally released in 1993. Virgin Interactive Entertainment published the game. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
You can play Krusty's Super Fun House on PC.
It was scored by Bigmouth Studios, David Whittaker and Nu Romantic Productions.
